website_summaries.verdict: Recognized for its superb temperature control, this thermos will keep your drinks refreshingly cool for hours.
pros: Crafted with heavy-duty materials and construction, this thermos will last years
Customers appreciate the product's high-quality feel and performance
cons: Exterior gets hot if warm liquid is poured inside

customer_reviews.title: piece of junk !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the reviews from other buyers. I am extremely disappointed. The product came with a nice packaging. I filled up this bottle with ice left in a car, the temperature in the was in high the low 90. Eight hours later there was no ice left all warm water, and the water jug sweated at the same time I had another 64 oz water travel jug from a well known brand and there was minimal effected to that jug 90% of ice remaining ! The coldest water bottle sells for $43 ! I returned the bottle immediately... Test it for yourself......
customer_reviews.author: outback wander

customer_reviews.title: One terrific water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew about this water bottle when my nephew was going to intermediate school. I spent a lot of money trying out all different water bottles. None came close to what this water bottle claims and does. A lot of times my nephew drinka all of the water before at least half of the ice melts. So I just top off with more ice and add ice water, and I can keep it going longer without having to fill the whole thing with ice. All I can say is try it,I guarantee you won't be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: daiyo toshi

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold, great size, great carrying handle.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teenagers for sports. They love how the design stands out so they can easily identify their water bottle amongst the teams. The size is perfect and they are easy to clean with the wide mouth. If you put ice in, the water stays really cold for a long time...even in the sun. My kids also love the carrying handle because it's the perfect shape and size to carry comfortably. It's also very durble. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the rubber strip around the bottom area ripped off one of them the first week.
customer_reviews.author: CallMeKenzi

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband after he loved my 23 oz coldest bottle's insulation, but he drinks way more water than I do so he needed a bigger bottle and he loves it, his only little issue is that the cap is not level, he says it's very minor but I thought I should note it. Otherwise, the bottle is perfect for him. He says 5/5 bottle would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chan

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with a straw cap
customer_reviews.text: I love the bottle. It does everything they claim it does. Very disappointed that it didn’t not come with a straw cap though. I purchased the 21oz about 6 months ago and it came with one. I had to pay $11 to get a straw cap for this. Would have been a 5 star if this wasn’t the case. Still worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Waugh

customer_reviews.title: GET A WIDE MOUTH LID AND THIS IS THE BEST PURCHASE YOU CAN MAKE FOR A WATER BOTTLE.
customer_reviews.text: This is really one of the best purchases I have ever made! I have had other bottles similar to this one but this one just blows them all away. One caveat though, it's not good until you get the lid with a straw. It was kinda a pain in the *** without it. The drink constantly was falling everywere because I did not fasten the lid tightly enough! The wide mouth lid with straw changed everything and made this great water bottle even BETTER!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Seibert

customer_reviews.title: If you want insulated - this is the water bottle for you!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first water bottle that I have found that truly keeps your water cold for 24-hours. I fill my water bottle with ice and water every morning. If I have any left, I am dumping ice-cubes out in the following morning before I refill it. It is a tad heavy as it is 64 ounces, but that is to be expected! This water bottle is well worth the extra cost!
customer_reviews.author: JMulh

customer_reviews.title: Super cool heavy duty water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend. He uses it literally every day, I plan to buy another one. Stays cold for hours. Easy to clean too. And the cap is big enough to fit big ice cubes in it. This thing could probably use 3-4 trays of ice cubes. It's big and sturdy. On the heavier side even if doesn't have fluids so just be aware
customer_reviews.author: Christina Starr

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cold
customer_reviews.text: After the length of use I put into this bottle, I can definitely say it has been one of the best purchases I have made in regards to water bottles. I work outside in all temperature weather. When it is sometimes 100+ outside this water bottle stays cold all shift and the ice is still in there abouts half way melted.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Comporato

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 64oz version as I have decided to try and increase my water intake. It actually does keep water ice cold. It took the ice three days to melt and that was with me constantly adding water. It is heavy to lift so I will have to purchase the cap with the attached straw in order to avoid constantly removing the cap to take a drink, but I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kanekii

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for Gym or With Sport Lid
customer_reviews.text: The sport lid creates a vacuum and prevents you from drinking much at all and SCREAMS as you drink. If you try to adjust or move the air stopper, it leaks. The white band isn’t in any way connected to the bottle so it slides around and will immediately get dirty if it touches anything at all. I got this for working out and making sure my water stays cold, but i can’t really test it because it’s so difficult to drink from if you use their sport lid.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cox

customer_reviews.title: It holds up to the brand name
customer_reviews.text: The coldest water bottle sure holds up to the name. I don’t add the much ice and I swear it only gets colder the longer it’s in there! I’ve also had days where I don’t add any ice and it still works very great. Note that I only use it for 10hours tops so I can’t attest for anything after that. 4 stars though because at this price point I would have liked a cleaning utsensil for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Works great I love it. I fill the completely with the ice in the hot summer sun it last all day. I subtracted one star because of the narrow mouth. You have to put ice in a bowl and add it to the container plus it’s difficult to clean but other than that I love it
customer_reviews.author: TWJ in Florida

customer_reviews.title: BEST WATER BOTTLE EVER
customer_reviews.text: The best water bottle that exists. I've had a few of them and none compare to this one. Keeps ice for days. Finally have constant cold water all day at the office
customer_reviews.author: diego plasencia

customer_reviews.title: To drink from this bootle is uncomfortable. Dont Buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: To drink from this bootle is uncomfortable. I think it could be designed by engineers from Florida better. I bet they don't drink from this water bottle themselves otherwise, they would notice that it is very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: yury

customer_reviews.title: The Coldest Water is the coldest!
customer_reviews.text: Kept seeing Facebook influencers use this on cooking shows and had to try it for myself. Got it in my favorite color. It works just perfectly and lives up to its hype.
customer_reviews.author: Davida Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The coldest water bottle is amazing!! No metallic taste no whistling when I drink (I am using the alternative lid with the straw) I love this water bottle!! No condensation and it stays cold as advertised I fill it twice a day for my gallon of water.
customer_reviews.author: BookWorm

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value. but great product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday in florida. It holds in ice cold less that what is advertised though i stilll think its durable and sturdy. not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erickson I.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews. I’m a letter carrier and am outside for at least 7 hours. I don’t know if it’s because the 64oz is too wide and the liquid warms up easier as opposed to a more narrow container- but over several days this thing was a disaster. In a few hours all the ice melted and the contents were starting to actually get warm. Now the bottle stays inside my truck and to be fair it is like an oven in there. But I found my old Stanley does an A+ job while this piece of metal gets an F.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best water bottles
customer_reviews.text: This is my third and largest Coldest bottle. We are an active family and spend a lot of time outdoors. We prefer our water very cold and this does the trick. I bought my first one about three years ago and it still is great. I bought this 64 ounce recently for spending hours at our beach club. The ice never melts. Highly recommend the Coldest brand!
customer_reviews.author: TB78

customer_reviews.title: That's cold
customer_reviews.text: This bottle does seem to keep my water colder then lot of others I've tried, good quality, really is the coldest water!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sch

customer_reviews.title: Good cold water
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good! I've used it for a few weeks now for work and keeps my water ice cold, used the same ice for four refills of water in the day and did not have to add ice! It kept that cold in this 90 degree heat! Only drawback is I wanted the black one and only blue or pink was available so I had to settle for the blue....
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Likes: keeps ice frozen and water cold even working outside in south Alabama heat all day long Cons: size is too big to drink out of actually busted my lip trying to drink from this once
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it cold!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I use it when playing sports. Fill it up with about 2/3 ice and the rest water. Keeps water cold for over a day. Also great customer service. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: MTB_Man

customer_reviews.title: Ice cold bottle
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bottle, well constructed, only draw back is it about .5 inches too tall to fit in the refrigerator space for ice and water..
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Work great after 36+ hours still had some ice left thats after i also added a warm 24oz bottle of water
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne s.

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping things cool all day
customer_reviews.text: Fill it up with cold water from the well and it is still not warm by the end of a summer day. Well made. It is just a little large to drink from, nevertheless; I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Grover Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is cheaper than other brands.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was skeptical of this no name bottle, it isn’t a Yeti or Hydroflask, which is all I ever see. First night I filled it up with ice/water and checked the temperature 30 hours later....still 34 degrees. I have taken it with me kayaking for 9 hours in the 90 degree weather and have ice cold water all day (honestly it’s almost too cold).
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe “The Cold Water”
customer_reviews.text: No worth the cost. Water bottle does not last that of a Yeti. Will hold ice for about 8 hours. I would not recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Hardware4you

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money ! Ice melted first 10 min .
customer_reviews.text: I fell for this hook , line and sinker . Used it first time and filled it up with ice and water . Went to play tennis and ice melted first 10 min . Total scam and joke . Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely keeps it Cold
customer_reviews.text: Definitely keeps my water cold! I drink a lot of water and needed something big enough but works like it says. Well this definitely fits the bill. Do I recommend it? Yep! If I would have known how good this was I would have gotten the gallon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I work outside in Florida, I take 2 with me to work, this is aa good as a yeti, the water left is still cold the next morning
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest. True to the videos I saw on it, you’ll still have ice cubes 24 hours later. After 36 hours the ice cubes are gone but the water is still colder than tap water.
customer_reviews.author: beke

customer_reviews.title: Best water bottle ever
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Use every single day. Durable and holds a half gallon of water! Best part is that it takes over 24 hours for my ice to melt! If you like cold water, get this!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Use this EVERY DAY
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle. I've left it over the weekend at work with ice water - there was still ice on Monday. HUGE too - I know that this is how much water I need to drink per day - no refilling a billion times. Bottom line - great size and stays cold. ~ May want to use a reusable straw though - the mouth is big.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B Chandler Jr

customer_reviews.title: Beats the YETI in every way!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is awesome. Aside from color, you will not be disappointed. Holds ice for up to 36 hours in a 75° room.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Roberts

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle! Filled it with ice and cold water and put it in the fridge. 3 days later it still had ice. It took a day on the counter to completely thaw. I think I need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is amazing. Forget all the rest, buy this one. I've been on a quest for months to find the perfect water bottle. This one is it. It actually kept my ice water, with ice not melted, for 5 entire days, in high heat. I also bought the cap and straw to go with it. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: njmarina

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. My boyfriend is outside 10-12hrs a day and it's still cold when he gets home at night. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: The Coldest Water Bottle- Really!
customer_reviews.text: my second purchase! these are the greatest bottle, they really do keep your water cold. I still have ice on day 2 or more- fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Product works as advertised. No “blowing smoke”!
customer_reviews.text: I like my 64oz Coldest Water Bottle. I use it every day and it keeps my drinking water cold. Pack it with ice and then fill.
customer_reviews.author: ronald j. hax

customer_reviews.title: Even with florida heat keeps drinks ice cold. Even ...
customer_reviews.text: Even with florida heat keeps drinks ice cold . Even after 24 hours still filled with ice . Only downside is lid Seems to leak , however I dont have one regret buying and even looking at getting one for the old lady......worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic J Cardone

customer_reviews.title: Best water bottle ever
customer_reviews.text: Beyond awesome! Ice stay cools for a couple days just refil the water! Doesn’t leak evens in the tour pack of my Harley!
customer_reviews.author: Car Czar

customer_reviews.title: Great value and water stays ice cold
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the bottle was too big and I wanted to return it but now I love it. It keeps me drinking water and because it’s so big, I put lemons inside to have ice cold lemon water that stays ice cold for 48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Vedovatto

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. One star down, would have liked a different option for drinking besides a LARGe hole
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Borsheim

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding water bottle of the highest quality. You can leave your water bottle in your car during hot days and still drink cold to cool water!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: It stays cold in the hot Singapore Sun!
customer_reviews.text: My Son says it keeps his water colder than any of his previous bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T.

customer_reviews.title: Not the coldest
customer_reviews.text: I work in AC and it does not stay cold, 10 hours at work and my juice is only slightly cool, not cold
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love my Coldest!
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely delivered excellent quality as promised. It holds ice up to three days (even while sitting in my hot car from time to time) and never sweats. I got the biggest bottle and my only wish is that it had a top with a flip straw like the smaller sizes do. I'm spreading the word, Coldest rules!
customer_reviews.author: angela ivey

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love that it keeps my sons water cold and with ice the whole day at soccer tournaments.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: A well made water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great water bottle and does what it promises to do. It keeps water cold all day long. Is it really the coldest water bottle out there? Probably not because I've had others that did the same thing but cost a lot less. Still I'm very happy with this water bottle and I especially like the lid on it.
customer_reviews.author: chris steinbacher

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water cold for 2 plus days
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle best on the market but got lost I did receive my money back
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cold
customer_reviews.text: I like this water bottle it keeps water so cold all day long I would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Ron  Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best bottle yet.
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions and filled with ice then water... Did this at 8 am then went to Huntington beach for roughly 7 hours. Very pleased water was cold and held ice the entire time..came home and left what was still in bottle over night and 24 hours later still ice cold.....excellent purxhase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love my Coldest Water bottle 64oz. It really does keep your water cold for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle, great company!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Coldest Water Bottle, I now own two sizes. The product is great and works! I had to contact them and let me tell you that their customer service and appreciation of customers is top notch. You can’t beat these guys
customer_reviews.author: Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Why the rust tho
customer_reviews.text: Keeps water cold all day . Rust spots showing up inside now tho
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: It really does keep the water cold!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! It really does keep my water with bcaa powder mixed in really cold for my work outs at the gym! A+++ product! I would highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Keeps my water cold for the entire day.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Doran

customer_reviews.title: Cold
customer_reviews.text: A great find! It really does keep water cold all day and night
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bottle over a year ago. It is made well & keeps drinks cold all day & into the next. I plan on purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: D Cook

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold all day!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this water bottle! I fill it the night before I go to work and take it with me everywhere I go during my workday. I water stays cold all day! My only complaint is that it is a little bit cumbersome to drink from, so I have to pour it into another glass. I would love for them to make a sip top for it and a handle!
customer_reviews.author: M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I work long hours overnight and don't get to get up from my desk often and now I rarely run out of water. I almost wish I'd have gotten a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It is the "Coldest Water Bottle" and at an affordable ...
customer_reviews.text: It is the "Coldest Water Bottle" and at an affordable price. Keeps the water cold, cold, cold! 90 degrees plus all day and water was still ice cold! This product lives up to its promise.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely lives up to its word!
customer_reviews.text: I got the 21oz for myself. I loved it so much that I got the 64 oz for my son who is an over the road trucker. Now I’m gonna get the 32 oz for his wife and hope they have the pink one!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Kaanehe

customer_reviews.title: By far the best water bottle I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: By far the best water bottle I've ever had. Keeps water cold in my truck in 110 degree heat all day long. This is a life saver! I bought a second one I was so impressed
customer_reviews.author: brandon johnson

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.text: I love my jug. I am going to order another one. When I put ice in it, the ice last over 3 days. So convenient when I go workout.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: Keep water cold for long periods of time and for 3-4 days
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this water bottle. It helps me make sure I’m drinking enough water throughout the day! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It keeps things cold for 3 days in the hot weather
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the office and gym!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for people who don’t remember to hydrate. This keeps me drinking water all day! Soooo worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Stay Lucid

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Holds enough water to get me through my work day and stays cold until the last drop.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The Title Says It All.
customer_reviews.text: I left 4 ice cubes in this bottle for almost a week, when I opened it again there were 3. Get the big size.
customer_reviews.author: Max Howard

customer_reviews.title: 64oz of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best. I would buy this over a yeti any day! Keeps my water cold all day and helps me get my 64oz of water a day!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Xtian

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle
customer_reviews.text: Bottle is great but suctioning is a bit of an issue
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product so far! Water does stay cold throughout the work day. Definitely follow the instructions and add ice to the top before you add your liquid. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Supernova

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm an a/c mechanic and work out in the sun alot. this bottle keeps my water nice and cold all day.
customer_reviews.author: J. Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall just doesn't keep my water cold for as long as I was told it would
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie it doesn't keep water cold for as long as it was advertised
customer_reviews.author: Keisaun

customer_reviews.title: Save EARTH!!!
customer_reviews.text: You're doing MOTHER EARTH A HUGE FAVOR!!!! Really keeps ya drinks COOL FOR 36HRS!
customer_reviews.author: Axl Rose Albon

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The coldest water bottle works great and keeps water cold like it says it does I’m happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love this water bottle and it keeps water so cold and with ice for days!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hedlund

customer_reviews.title: I love how it’s so big And has enough room for me to but my Lemons easy to grab
customer_reviews.text: I work at mister car wash and I have to be outside a lot and this help keep my water cold
customer_reviews.author: Rama Denadji

customer_reviews.title: BEST WATER BOTTLE EVER
customer_reviews.text: Since this water bottle arrived, I haven't been without it. I would definitely rate in the top 10 of my purchase from Amazon EVER! It arrived quickly and the product is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie Adams-Mercer

customer_reviews.title: The Awesome bottle
customer_reviews.text: I like how cold the liquid stays no matter the temp outside, but I the lid is kinda of a pain!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Dixon

customer_reviews.title: The name says it all
customer_reviews.text: Alright I am a brand whore and usually only get yeti products but I am blown away by this bottle it holds ice longer then my yeti thermos does well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold for days!!!
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is the best, wish it had more color options!
customer_reviews.author: Abimael

customer_reviews.title: Great insulation!
customer_reviews.text: The water stays very cold! The handle on the screw top is also convenient for carrying!
customer_reviews.author: David Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Water stays cold thee entire day
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Water stays cold thee entire day, even if left in a hot vehicle. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it says. I will buy a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: virginia mendoza

customer_reviews.title: It really does keep your water cold.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It is awesome to have cold water during long workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Ollison

product_meta.title: The Coldest Water Bottle 64 oz Wide Mouth Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Hydro Travel Mug - Ice Cold Up to 36 Hrs/Hot 13 Hrs Double Walled Flask - with Strong Cap (Sailor Blue, 64 oz)
feature_bullets: Blue 64 oz Water Bottle - Huge Growler carry load for people that drink water all day Strong Handle - Forget caps that break. This is heavy duty time. Carry the 64 oz Water Bottle with confidence
Strong Handle - Forget caps that break. This is heavy duty time. Carry the 64 oz Water Bottle with confidence
Superior Build - Built of true stainless steel, double wall material, topped with a powder coat. We wanted to create the best 64 oz growler
The Ultimate Growler - Built for Athletes and High Performers. No cheap materials. No cutting corners. We understand you need the best.
Lifetime Warranty - Against manufacturer defects. We believe in our products and understand you need to too.
